definition: letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
"roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The headwords in this dictionary are in bold type.
sentences.chinese: 本词典的词条用的是粗体字。

sentences.english: Behind the tip of the A, behind the plateau of Mont -Saint-Jean, is the forest of Soignes.
sentences.chinese: 在A字的尖顶和圣约翰山高地后面的，是索瓦宁森林。

sentences.english: Two special units focusing on initial and final consonant clusters.
sentences.chinese: 包含两个特别的单元，提供字首与字尾子音群的练习。

sentences.english: You will be able to enliven your site in the direct meaning of this word.
sentences.chinese: 你将能够搞活您网站中的直接意义，这两个字。

sentences.english: Well spelling bee is a well-known competition of spelling words.
sentences.chinese: 今天的话题是拚字比赛。

sentences.english: MOSE is a play on the Italian name for Moses.
sentences.chinese: 摩西这个字是取自义大利人名摩西而来。

sentences.english: There are too many misprints in the book. ;
Only the initial letter in the first word of any complimentary close is capitalized.
sentences.chinese: 任何结尾谦称用语都只大写第一个字的第一个字母。

sentences.english: He doesn't back off, though, when I raise the F-word.
sentences.chinese: 他没有退缩，不过，当我提出的F字。

sentences.english: I couldn't understand a single word. … You could have been singing in Norwegian.
sentences.chinese: 我一个字也听不懂，你概略在用挪威语演唱吧。

sentences.english: The cows were branded with an A in a circle.
sentences.chinese: 那些牛被烙上了加圆圈的A字。

sentences.english: They are the five problems listed above.
sentences.chinese: 就是整上面讲的那五个字。

sentences.english: The words had been cut out of a newspaper.
sentences.chinese: 这些字是从报纸上剪下来的。

sentences.english: This article is divided into three parts besides the introduction, approximately 35,000 characters.
sentences.chinese: 本文除引言外共分三部分，约三万五千字。

sentences.english: Bar codes, character recognition, machine vision.
sentences.chinese: 条码，字元识别，机器视觉。

sentences.english: And just below, there was a toll free number to call with disputes.
sentences.chinese: 就在那行字下面，有个反馈异议的免费号码。

character book (i.e. school primer)

to use letters/to use words/diction
old character/archaic form of a Chinese character
